thread.title: Notable & Quotable: Cory Booker and School Choice
thread.title_full: Notable & Quotable: Cory Booker and School Choice - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: Notable & Quotable: Cory Booker and School Choice
text:
Sen. Cory Booker, who voted Tuesday against confirming Betsy DeVos as education secretary, speaking in 2012 at a conference of the American Federation for Children, the advocacy group chaired at the time by Mrs. DeVos: 


I cannot ever stand up and stand against a parent having options, because I benefited from my parents having options. And when people tell me they’re against school choice, whether it’s the Opportunity...
